       Tarantulas gives an insane chuckle. "Idiots! They'll never be able to 
get into this base. There are no air vents, the blast doors have sealed the 
ship, the shileds are on, the weapons are armed, and the island is surrounded 
by two more shields." He turned to Klash. "They have no chance. Were safe."

       Hell Beast was sent flying from the rapid fire. He rolled and took 
cover behinde some debris as he fired back.

       Nighteyes ran as fast as she could from the Black Fortress. Her skills 
were needed else where and Craken had abandoned the Fem bots attack. He was 
going to another location.

--part1_b6.117aea81.27c43527_boundary
